item.title: BabyPython - "1 CAT COMPANY CTF" crypto and deserialization challenge
item.author: Author
item.description: On the 1 CAT COMPANY CTF we didn’t manage to finalize our solution for the BabyPython challenge, created by Vahe Karapetyan, but one of our team members - Varik Matevosyan, solved it anyways after the time was up.
